thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Almost perfect
thread.title_full: Almost perfect - Review of Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Laura E
title: Almost perfect
text:
The hotel was great, spacious, clean and soundproof. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The location is just okay. We spent a lot more on cabs than we expected to get to the major sites. Also, the service at breakfast was consistently scattered. We got parts of our meal each day, but never really the complete order we placed. But, the overall stay was great, and hotel was very comfortable.
Room Tip: The Artist's Suite was great. See more room tips
